title: Using the pagenum package
text: Sometimes can useful add footnote number graphics. package makes easy automatically add time-stamp page number graphics. package can also used add general text anywhere type graphics device (base/lattice/ggplot).

title: Using the pagenum package
text: First, set starting page number 1. call pagenum() function add page number current graphic automatically increment page number counter stored options().  argument num="" used, page counter automatically incremented.
code: setPagenum(1) plot(Sepal.Length~Sepal.Width, data=iris, col=Species, pch=19) pagenum()

title: Using the pagenum package
code: op = par(mfrow=c(1,2)) plot(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width, data=iris, col=Species, pch=19) plot(Petal.Length ~ Petal.Width, data=iris, col=Species, pch=19) par(op) pagenum(num="", text="Figures 2a, 2b") pagenum(num="", text="Draft",         x=.5, y=.95, just=c('center','top'),         col="wheat", cex=3)

title: Using the pagenum package
code: setPagenum(getPagenum()+1) # Manual increment library("lattice") xyplot(Sepal.Length~Sepal.Width, data=iris, groups=Species) pagenum(date=TRUE)

what: ggplot2 with stamp at top right
title: Using the pagenum package
code: library("ggplot2") ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Width, y=Sepal.Length,                  color=Species)) + geom_point() + theme_classic() pagenum(text="ABC Corp - ", date=TRUE,         x=.95, y=.95, just=c('right','top'))

title: Put Page Numbers on Graphics — pagenum
text: num number put page.  number given, value options()$pagenum used. text text use front page number. date FALSE (default), add date page number. date.format format use date. x Horizontal position timestamp, [0,1]. Default .03 y Vertical position timestamp, [0,1]. Default .03 just Jufstification.  Default c('left','bottom') col Color use text. cex Character expansion. Default 0.75.

title: Put Page Numbers on Graphics — pagenum
text: Returns value stored global variable. Returns value options()$pagenum

title: Put Page Numbers on Graphics — pagenum
text: Use setPagenum create global variable page number. pagenum() called without argument, value options()$pagenum used determine page number. time pagenum() called, options()$pagenum automatically incremented 1.
